       Tarantulas was picking up the Destron communication, although it was 
filled with static and noise. He worked on it a little until Hell Beast 
approached. "Its a classic Destron trick Tarantulas. They want to get into 
the base by blowing open the shields. Counter that attack with these."
       In his large aged hands laid a smooth black plate about a foot in 
circumfrence. The device, with the bright Predacon/Decepticon insignia of the 
Neo Decepticon Empire on it, was built to release a mini force feild in a 
distance of 10 feet. These plates, when laid around the shield perimiter, 
would almost double the strength of the shields and undoubtedly stop the  
Destron operation currently in progress. With the Autoguns, Missle turrets, 
the EMP canon, four manule defense canons, and a hull so thick that a 
titanium missle couldnt blow through it, Hell Beast was strategically sound.
       Tarantulas picked up the device, and with Black Aracnia, Klash, and 
Quickstrike they went to a cargo hold. There they found the plates and began 
to spread them over the shield perimiter.
       Hell Beast drew his chain gun and loaded it. After replacing it he did 
it to several other weapons in the weapons locker. The assortment of fire 
arms the Ramora contained was absolutely devilish. At the bridge he watched 
his troops, confident in thier actions.

       Craken and Bezerker, carrying the damaged and almost dead Nighteyes 
quckly returned to the Ramora quickly. The mech fluid from the bots peeled 
off of them. Craken, carrying the other two, entered the Ramora via a top 
most zone of the shield dropped and quickly activated agian.

--part1_92.10cdcb7e.27cadf4f_boundary
